41. The undertaking shall disclose the process for setting the targets, including whether and how
the undertaking engaged directly with consumers and/or end-users, their legitimate
representatives, or with credible proxies that have insight into their situation in:
(a) setting any such targets;
(b) tracking the undertaking’s performance against them; and
(c) identifying, if any, lessons or improvements as a result of the undertaking’s performance.
